title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: get up and running with Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client library for Ollama; chat, generate, embed with any model served by Ollama.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Ollama, usable in Node or browsers via fetch.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package to use Ollama models as LLMs or chat models in LangChain pipelines.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (chat, admin, model management) similar to ChatGPT interface.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama with fluent API, streaming, and embedding support.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Interactive CLI wrapper around Ollama with chat history, prompt templates, and markdown rendering.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension bringing local Ollama models into GitHub Copilot-like inline suggestions.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU autoscaling and persistent model cache.

title: ollama-chat
summary: Minimal React chat app using ollama-js and Vite, deployable as a static site.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Retrieval-augmented generation stack combining Ollama, Chroma DB, and LangChain for local docs.

title: ollama-nix
summary: Nix flake providing Ollama binaries, CUDA variants, and NixOS module for declarative deployment.

title: ollama-django
summary: Django package adding Ollama model integration with admin UI and REST endpoints.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Community Rust crate for Ollama featuring Tokio-based async client and strong typing.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Self-hosted Discord bot that lets servers chat with local Ollama models using slash commands.

title: ollama-slack
summary: Slack Bolt app integrating Ollama for private channels or DMs with configurable system prompts.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin to run local LLM prompts inside notes and insert completions directly.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration by deepset allowing Ollama models as generators in Haystack pipelines.

title: ollama-streamlit
summary: Streamlit chat component template that connects to Ollama and supports session memory.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: Community .NET SDK for Ollama with NuGet package and comprehensive async API coverage.
